  • Method Details

    • addPanel

      void addPanel(JComponent jComponent, String constraints)
      Adds a Swing component to the GUI with the specified constraints.
      Parameters:
      jComponent - The Swing component to add.
      constraints - The constraints for placing the component.

    • getMojangChatPanel

      JComponent getMojangChatPanel()
      Retrieves the Mojang chat panel.
      Returns:
      The Mojang chat panel as a Swing component.

    • addDynamicTitle

      void addDynamicTitle(boolean condition, String falseT, String trueT)
      Adds a dynamic title to the GUI based on the given condition.
      Parameters:
      condition - The condition that determines which title to display.
      falseT - The title to display when the condition is false.
      trueT - The title to display when the condition is true.
